question: What is the sum of the first 50 natural numbers?
If x² - 5x + 6 = 0, find the value of x.
The average of five numbers is 20. If one number is 30, what is the average of the remaining four numbers?
A train running at 60 km/h crosses a pole in 18 seconds. Find the length of the train.
What is the remainder when 2^10 is divided by 7?
If A + B = 180° in a triangle, find angle C.
Find the next number in the series: 3, 6, 12, 24, ?
Which of the following numbers is a perfect square?
Speed of a boat in still water is 15 km/h. If the speed of the stream is 3 km/h, find the time to travel 24 km downstream.
In a class, 40% of students play cricket and 30% play football. If 10% play both, find the percentage of students who play either cricket or football.
